Package com.gnmathur.saarekaam.core.task

Class SKTaskWrapper

java.lang.Object
com.gnmathur.saarekaam.core.task.SKTaskWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
SKTaskWrapperMBean
public class SKTaskWrapper extends Object implements SKTaskWrapperMBean
A wrapper for SKTask that holds the state of the task. This is used by the scheduler to keep track of the task. Task state is being updated from two places - 1. The scheduler SKTaskScheduler that is responsible for scheduling the task. This thread updates the state of the task when it is scheduled, or when it is cancelled by the scheduler 2. The task thread SKTaskRunnable that is responsible for executing the task. This thread updates the state of the task when itis running, completes successfully or fails

      public void markTaskCancelled()
      Note: We do not record the time for cancelled tasks. This is because a cancelled task will eventually be marked as either having completed successfully or failed. We will record the time then.

    • getTaskCancelCount

      public long getTaskCancelCount()
      Description copied from interface: SKTaskWrapperMBean
      This method returns the number of times this task has been cancelled. A cancelled task can still complete successfully or fail. Depending on whether it completes successfully or fails, the task will be marked as completed or failed, and the corresponding success or fail counters will be incremented.
      Specified by:
      getTaskCancelCount in interface SKTaskWrapperMBean
      Returns:
      the number of times this task has been cancelled

    • getTaskRunCount

      public long getTaskRunCount()
      Description copied from interface: SKTaskWrapperMBean
      Returns the number of times this task has been scheduled to run. The task could have completed successfully, failed or cancelled.
      Specified by:
      getTaskRunCount in interface SKTaskWrapperMBean
      Returns:
      the number of times this task has been scheduled to run

    • getTaskTotalRunTime

      public long getTaskTotalRunTime()
      Description copied from interface: SKTaskWrapperMBean
      Returns the total time this task has run in milliseconds. This includes the time spent in failed, cancelled and successful runs.
